		<!--
		************************************************************
		EVERY, every so many days. 1 being every day, 2 being every 2nd day, and 30 being every 30 day</br>
		WEEKLY, 1 - 7. eg 1 for Monday and 7 for Sunday</br>
		MONTHLY, collection day is the actual date eg 25th, from the start date</br>
		BIANNUALLY, 6 months, collection day is the actual date eg 25th, from the start date</br>
		ANNUALLY, collection day is the actual date eg 25th, from the start date</br>
		QUARTERLY, collection day is the actual date eg 25th, from the start date</br>
		************************************************************
		-->
		<input type="hidden" name="frequency" value="MONTHLY">
		<input type="hidden" name="collectionDay" value="7"><!-- On the 7th day of the month -->
